headline: Is Verisk Still Attractive After a Tough 2024 and Mixed Long Term Returns?
summary: Wondering if Verisk Analytics at around $221 a share still makes sense for long term investors, or if the best days are already priced in? This breakdown aims to cut through the noise and focus on what the business is really worth. The stock has slipped 1.7% over the last week, is up 3.4% over the past month, but is still down 19.1% year to date and 22.5% over the last year, even though it has delivered 23.5% and 17.7% total returns over the past 3 and 5 years respectively. Those mixed...
